author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:

Aiming to fix the issue reported and discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44976

#### PR validation:

`AOD`->`miniAOD` step runs fine and `dz` is not `NaN` anymore. Tested with `DYto2TautoMuTauh` events.
title: Stop `dz` from being `NaN` in `PackedCandidates`
